snippet.title: Daikatana E3 trailer 1997
snippet.description:
Daikatana E3 trailer from 1997, when the game was still running on the old Quake engine. The absence of colored lighting and 3d accelerated graphics quickly led to the adoption of id Tech 2 which delayed the game that was supposed to be released by the end of 1997.

Notice how the trailer shows only level architecture, not any actual gameplay. Looks like some Quake 1 mod to me. The background music is pretty good though.
